How Moone works

Two taps and today's flow, mood, or cramps are saved.

Sync & Thrive

Moone's AI spots patterns

We crunch the data and reveal how your habits help or not your menstrual symptoms.

Why Moone is Different

Not just another period tracker. Moone is designed to be your personal health companion, adapting and growing with you.

Proactive Insights

No more endless scrolling through articles. We analyze your patterns and tell you exactly what you need to know.

  • Personalized daily insights
  • Learn from your habits

Works for Everyone

Whether you're on hormonal contraception or have a natural cycle, Moone adapts to your unique needs.

  • Supports all cycle types
  • Instant personalized feedback

Clear, Smart Reports

Weekly personalized reports that identify patterns and correlations in clear, actionable terms.

  • No complex graphs
  • Actionable recommendations

Why cycle-sync?

Did you know your needs change throughout your menstrual cycle? Hormone fluctuations can affect your energy, cravings, mood, and even how your body uses certain nutrients.

Moone adapts to each phase of your cycle, providing tailored recommendations for:

  • Menstrual Phase – Replenish iron and rest.
  • Follicular Phase – Boost energy with fresh foods.
  • Ovulatory Phase – Support hormones with healthy fats.
  • Luteal Phase – Satisfy cravings and balance mood.

Your Privacy Matters

We understand how personal and sensitive your health data is. That's why we've built Moone with privacy at its core.

End-to-End Encryption

Your data is encrypted before it leaves your device, ensuring only you can access your sensitive information.

Encryption at Rest

All your data is stored using industry-standard encryption, protecting your information even when it's not in use.

No Third-Party Sharing

We never share or sell your data to third parties. Your privacy is our priority.
